=Updates=

*2009-11-13:*<br>
Grappelli 2.0 is officially released. Documentation is updated.

*2009-08-11:*<br>
Grappelli 2 prerelease, see [http://code.google.com/p/django-grappelli/wiki/Grappelli_2 G2 Docs] and take a look at the [screenshots Screenshots].

*2009-03-26:*<br>
Added M2M Related Lookup, see [http://code.google.com/p/django-grappelli/wiki/relatedlookups Related Lookups].

*2009-03-26:*<br>
Added admin_url context-processor, updated "Available Settings" and "Installation".

*2009-03-24:*<br>
Related objects are now automatically displayed right beside the input-field, see [http://code.google.com/p/django-grappelli/wiki/relatedlookups Related Lookups].
<br><br>
*2009-03-16:*<br>
Added page-related help-section.

*2009-03-16:*<br>
Added search_fields_verbose, see [http://code.google.com/p/django-grappelli/wiki/modeladminoptions ModelAdmin Options] for more details.

*2009-03-15:*<br>
Simplified TinyMCE-Setup (because the skin for TinyMCE is a real "skin" now).

*2009-03-15:*<br>
Added User-related Shortcuts.

*2009-03-15:*<br>
Changed the Installation process. Grappelli needs to be added to your INSTALLED_APPS in order to use the Navigation Area. See [http://code.google.com/p/django-grappelli/wiki/Installation Installation] for more details.
<br><br>
*2009-03-14:*<br>
Items for Sidebar Navigation (Admin Index Site) are read from the database - no need to change navigation.html anymore.

*2009-03-14:*<br>
Added Position-Field to Grappelli ... thanks to Joel Watts.

*2009-03-14:*<br>
Visual Generic Relationships ... thanks to Weston Nielson.

*2008-11-25:*<br>
Refactored Tabular Inline in order to make it work like Stacked Inlines. Drag & Drop should work fine now ...
